updates.description: The new version of the Excel API provides developers with more control over Excel's features. It includes new endpoints for managing worksheets, tables, and charts.
updates.automation_value: The new API capabilities allow for more extensive automation of Excel tasks, reducing the need for manual work and saving time.
updates.business_impact: This update can significantly increase productivity by automating routine tasks, freeing up time for more complex tasks. It also provides opportunities for integration with other systems, potentially streamlining business processes.

updates.description: This add-in provides a suite of tools for automating common Excel tasks, such as data entry, formatting, and report generation. It includes a new feature that allows users to create custom automation scripts.
updates.automation_value: This feature can significantly reduce the time spent on repetitive tasks, allowing users to focus on more complex tasks.
updates.business_impact: By reducing the time spent on routine tasks, this update can increase productivity and allow users to focus on tasks that add more value to the business. The ability to create custom scripts also provides flexibility and can be tailored to specific business needs.

updates.description: This update enhances Excel's integration with Power Automate, Microsoft's workflow automation service. Users can now create and manage Power Automate flows directly from Excel.
updates.automation_value: This integration makes it easier to automate workflows that involve Excel and other Microsoft services, potentially saving users a significant amount of time.
updates.business_impact: This update can streamline workflows and reduce the time spent on manual tasks, leading to increased productivity. It also provides opportunities for integration with other Microsoft services, potentially improving business processes.

updates.description: Smart Templates are a new feature in Excel that uses AI to generate templates based on the user's data and needs. The templates can be customized and saved for future use.
updates.automation_value: Smart Templates can save users time by automatically generating appropriate templates, reducing the need for manual setup.
updates.business_impact: This feature can save time and reduce errors by automating the creation of templates. It can also improve the quality of reports and other outputs by ensuring they are based on the most relevant and up-to-date data.

updates.description: This update enhances Excel's data connectors, making it easier to import data from external sources. It includes new connectors for popular business tools and improved support for API-based data sources.
updates.automation_value: The improved data connectors can automate the process of importing and updating data, saving users time and reducing the risk of errors.
updates.business_impact: This update can improve the accuracy and timeliness of data used in reports and decision-making. It can also save time and reduce errors by automating the data import process.

results.raw_output:
1. Update Name: Excel API v2.0
   Release Date: November 2023
   Description: The new version of the Excel API provides developers with more control over Excel's features. It includes new endpoints for managing worksheets, tables, and charts. 
   Automation Value: The new API capabilities allow for more extensive automation of Excel tasks, reducing the need for manual work and saving time.

2. Update Name: Excel Automation Add-In
   Release Date: January 2024
   Description: This add-in provides a suite of tools for automating common Excel tasks, such as data entry, formatting, and report generation. It includes a new feature that allows users to create custom automation scripts.
   Automation Value: This feature can significantly reduce the time spent on repetitive tasks, allowing users to focus on more complex tasks.

3. Update Name: Excel Integration with Power Automate
   Release Date: June 2024
   Description: This update enhances Excel's integration with Power Automate, Microsoft's workflow automation service. Users can now create and manage Power Automate flows directly from Excel.
   Automation Value: This integration makes it easier to automate workflows that involve Excel and other Microsoft services, potentially saving users a significant amount of time.

4. Update Name: Excel Smart Templates
   Release Date: September 2025
   Description: Smart Templates are a new feature in Excel that uses AI to generate templates based on the user's data and needs. The templates can be customized and saved for future use.
   Automation Value: Smart Templates can save users time by automatically generating appropriate templates, reducing the need for manual setup.

5. Update Name: Excel Data Connectors Update
   Release Date: March 2025
   Description: This update enhances Excel's data connectors, making it easier to import data from external sources. It includes new connectors for popular business tools and improved support for API-based data sources.
   Automation Value: The improved data connectors can automate the process of importing and updating data, saving users time and reducing the risk of errors.
